00019   const char* const ROUNDTRIP_TESTS[] = {
00020     NULL,
00021         "~",
00022                 "CMPD",
00023     "~ CMPD",
00024     "CMPD >",
00025     "> > CMPD",
00026     "CMPD ~ ~",

00034   static Complex_Selector* createComplexSelector(string src) {
00035     string temp(src);
00036     temp += ";";
00037     return (*Parser::from_c_str(temp.c_str(), ctx, "", Position()).parse_selector_group())[0];
00038   }
00039   
00040   
00041   void roundtripTest(const char* toTest) {
00042 
00043     // Create the initial selector
00044 
00045     Complex_Selector* pOrigSelector = NULL;
00046     if (toTest) {
00047       pOrigSelector = createComplexSelector(toTest);
00048     }
00049     
00050     string expected(pOrigSelector ? pOrigSelector->perform(&to_string) : "NULL");
00051   
00052     
00053     // Roundtrip the selector into a node and back
00054     
00055     Node node = complexSelectorToNode(pOrigSelector, ctx);
00056     
00057     stringstream nodeStringStream;
00058     nodeStringStream << node;
00059     string nodeString = nodeStringStream.str();
00060     cout << "ASNODE: " << node << endl;
00061     
00062     Complex_Selector* pNewSelector = nodeToComplexSelector(node, ctx);
00063     
00064     // Show the result
00065 
00066     string result(pNewSelector ? pNewSelector->perform(&to_string) : "NULL");
00067     
00068     cout << "SELECTOR: " << expected << endl;
00069     cout << "NEW SELECTOR:   " << result << endl;
00070 
00071     
00072     // Test that they are equal using the equality operator
00073     
00074     assert( (!pOrigSelector && !pNewSelector ) || (pOrigSelector && pNewSelector) );
00075     if (pOrigSelector) {
00076             assert( *pOrigSelector == *pNewSelector );
00077     }
00078 
00079     
00080     // Test that they are equal by comparing the string versions of the selectors
00081 
00082     assert(expected == result);
00083     
00084   }
00085 
00086 
00087         int main() {
00088     for (int index = 0; index < STATIC_ARRAY_SIZE(ROUNDTRIP_TESTS); index++) {
00089       const char* const toTest = ROUNDTRIP_TESTS[index];
00090       cout << "\nINPUT STRING: " << (toTest ? toTest : "NULL") << endl;
00091       roundtripTest(toTest);
00092     }
00093     
00094     cout << "\nTesting Done.\n";
00095   }
